examples:
What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: "Saving error" 
When I try to get into my design, refresh, or save, Canva tells me, "we couldnt save your design". I have done a lot of work on this file, is there any way to save it?

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: it won't save "connecting" and my wifi us working and I've refreshed many times

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I'm getting a "saving error." Have tried restarting my computer and my browser, and refreshing the page many times.
What type of problem is it ?: How to save Describe the problem: I get an error when saving and the option to refresh the page or close and the same thing comes out all the time

Describe your issue: Dear Canva, why I can’t save my design??  I’ve restart my phone+refresh my phone+sign out and sign in my canva acc..but still cannot save my design.. please take any action ASAP :(

What kind of problem?: Saving

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: It says "we couldn't save your design" and I keep on refreshing my page but it doesn't work.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: keeps saying saving error and even when i refresh and relog on, it still comes up

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I keeps giving saving errors and ass ti refresh

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I keep getting an error message about my design not saving. I reload the page and refresh, exit the tab/program and come back to it, and it doesn't allow me to make edits. Can you help me with this?

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I am getting a "saving error" message when I open my most recent design. I have tried to refresh, close, use a different device and I keep getting the same message. I really need to work on this file today for a deadline tomorrow. I am able to keep working on it but, I am afraid it won't save correctly and I'll have to start over!

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: When I open my link, it tells me that the changes have not been saved to refresh the page, I do it and it does the same again, and I cannot move it nothing to my file

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I keep getting a "Saving Error" whenever I try to edit a particular design. I'm not sure what to do with it. I've tried refreshing the page and even logging out and in, but the issue is still not resolved.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: when I try to open it, a tab says there is a saving error and I need to refresh the page but it changes nothing and shows the same window again
What's the problem ?: save Describe your problem: file is not saved after refresh, can it be restored?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can't get into my design to edit it as it just keeps saying 'changes didn't save' even when I refresh and come out. I have tried everything. PLease can someone help as I have a deadline today for the design!!!
What is your problem with ?: saving Describe the problem .: It shows "Save error", no access to editing, no changes when the page and computer are refreshed

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: getting "an error has occurred" when downloading design. Link to retry doesn't work. I've closed and reopened design as well and refreshed.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Canva is shutting down my computer when trying to view it enlarged. I also cannot edit on the mobile version. It continues to refresh EVERY TIME I try to make an edit. It’s been about a week doing this. It’s getting frustrating.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Whenever I try to get on to my project to edit it, it gives me a saving error and asks me to refresh the page, so I do, but it just gives me the same message.

What kind of problem is it ?: How to save Describe the problem: I want to create a cover but when I want to add something, it does not say that an error has occurred and that I refresh the page. And when I refresh the page and try again I get the same

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Saving paused lasts for an hour, and still ongoing. I am afraid to exit the site and refresh it because maybe I'll have to start from scratch again. What should I do to save it.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: A presentation that has been shared with me will not let me edit because there was a saving issue. I keep refreshing my page but nothing is working.

What type of problem?: Backup Describe your problem: Recording error: despite updating, refreshing the page, restarting the pc ect ...... Important document which required 1 week of work. thank you for your quick reply

What do you need help with?: Hello yes I just upgraded to premium and I’m not allowed to save my templates. It says there was a problem connecting to Canva. I keep refreshing and it tells me to sign up again. Would someone be able to assist please?

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I SEE A SAVING IS PAUSED MESSAGE IF I TRY REFRESHING IT TELLS ME I HAE TO SAVE MY DESIGN FIRST BUT STILL DOESNT SAVE EVEN AFTER I PRESS SAVE

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: In edit mode my project is continuously refreshing.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Keeps giving me a saving error message and wont let me access my design no matter how many times I refresh the page.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can’t smoothly edit my design because it kept on refreshing and it will go back to the first page.

What kind of problem?: جارٍ الحفظ

وصف مشكلتك: Error with saving which prevent me of editing the file even if i refresh the page

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: it constantly says saving error and to refresh the page, but it does it again and again even when i refresh the page

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: THIS IS A TIMELY ISSUE. My Jeanne anniversaire ecard has a saving error.  I cannot refresh or save in any way.  I tried to copy and start over but that's not happening either.

What is your problem with ?: Saving Describe the problem .: Good afternoon. Yesterday I quickly saved the design and closed it. Today I can not enter it, writes that there is an error saving - refresh the page, I refresh the page, but there is no result, you cannot even return to the previous version. What to do? How can you continue with the design? Usersnap report id:  Usersnap report url:<URL>

What kind of problem?: Sparar

Beskriv ditt problem: I can't access my work, it only says "couldn't save changes" all the time and that I need to refresh the site, but when I do that it happens the same again...

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: things get frozen and i can't move things on a page. i have to refresh for the ability to come back. it seems like a new bug

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I keep getting a "Saving Error" - fully connected to the internet, refreshed page, closed and reopened. Nothing is working. Couldn't download or make a copy because shows in saving error.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Cannot change name of art work, says it's open in another window but it's not. Tried refreshing page.
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, when I open a design, nothing is displayed. I refreshed the page, restart the computer. But the problem persists.
What can I help you with ?: I can't save my designs, it gives an error and a request to refresh the page, but it does not help

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I can't open a design I was working on because of a 'Saving error'. I refreshed the page, restarted computer, everything. can't access this specific design. Deliverable is due today - pls help!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Cannot open elements tab. Keeps refreshing on mobile app. I have deleted and re-downloaded and the problem persist.

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: the page does not load I have been with this problem for a week I cannot work in a continuous way now every so often it tells me to refresh the screen and what I had worked is not saved

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: not allowing downloading on my 6th attempt, refreshed and tried again and again.

What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: This "Refresh the page", is it also aimed at the app or just on the web? Another: Sometimes it happens that the art is well fitted, but when it appears on My Designs or on YT, it is out of shape, undocked ... I think it has to do with the 'rectangular gaps' ... which sometimes I try to reduce them and I can't always do it! Is it from the source itself?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Bug while apps refresh to  the picture
What kind of problem ?: Saving Describe your problem: Hello, I saved a design, and it says "import import a design: An unknown error occurred while saving your design. Please refresh the page . "

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: Cannot choose the page to be downloaded. Continues to refresh to design. Message received that states a repeated error has occurred.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: There is a message to say 'Saving Error' but it is not allowing me to access the document. I have refreshed and restarted my laptop but still getting the same message. I have full wifi.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: Single file will not download. I closed out of it, refreshed, the only message it gives says "Canva experienced a technical issue" but the status page has no issues

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: When I've been creating content in the past few days, it keeps freezing and I am unable to resize anything (text, elements etc.) or move anything. It only works again when I refresh the page. 

It is happening with increasing frequency (almost to the point where I have to refresh the page each time I make an edit). My internet connection is fine and it doesn't seem to matter how many elements I have in the design - it happens with ones where I have loads and designs where I only have a couple.

I'm not sure what is causing the problem so I can't replicate unfortunately. Would be very grateful for your help! Unfortunately if it can't be resolved I will have to cancel my subscription.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: The page often takes several minutes to refresh my designs. I am on the best internet connection possible.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: I was trying to download the power point presentation that I needed to submit but I kinda have some technical error I alreadyy refresh my devices and  re-sign in my account but it  still error. I tried this already last night up to now

What kind of problem?: Egyéb

Írd körül a problémát: When i try to open my design, the whole page glitches through the app and i cant do anything with my design, it keeps refreshing the design without letting me hit any button.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi Canva Team, For the past week or so, Canva has been really slow to react, to let me edit, it often needs me to refresh for the page, and all functions, to work properly but then in 5 mins I have to refresh again. Can you please help because I need to use Canva daily for my work and clients and it's driving me crazy! It's making my life way harder.

Describe your issue: This is what appears on my account after refreshing      There was an error resending your confirmation email. Please refresh the page and try again in a few moments.

What kind of problem?: Other
